page.title: 14Law and Order
page.content: 1985 has been a difficult year for law and order in our area because of the miners strike.There is still ill feeling between the mining community and the{police}force.Our area has been affected by numerous mining rallies and an increase in{vandalism}.The area that we have been studying has a community policeman called P.C. Knowles. He goes into schools and also takes care of young offenders.The most common{crimes}in our area are house burglaries,shop lifting and handbag snatching.The ages for these crimes varies between young children and old people.The least common crime in our area is manslaughter.In 1984 40% of crimes in the Barnsley area were solved .Any person suspected of committing a crime in the area has to go to Barnsley magistrates{court}for sentencing.
